documents.document: @PodcastingCouch Just listening to the pod mate, it'll happen. 6 points over the next two games will have us looking pretty.

That lovely fob off with the hand. Always sends the right signal.

I think we should sign @officialcwood
@talkSPORTLive - Will Suarez break Liverpool hearts again?
@talkSPORTLive - I think that's the most inspired commentary about Sturridge that I've heard recently (re being loved). Totally agree.
Listening in from NZ @talkSPORTLive. Come on Reds, we've had our rest, time to wake up :) #YNWA.

Just making sure I'm not missing something.. If I sign up to @beINSPORTS_NZ, will I have access to every game live?

@beINSPORTS_NZ @_Salvatori_ @SKYNZ Translation - you lied and know you really couldn't care less.
@KloppGoff is on @radiosportnz !
#whyWellington? Because I like rain and wind stupid!
@FrostieDaSnoman @patrick478 Thought it was a bit rich of him tbh. The kids looked like they were having heaps of fun though!
@patrick478 @FrostieDaSnoman zone, the language wasn't that bad and he seemed to think it would be completely PG. .
@patrick478 He told off the guy for saying Shit/Fuck a couple of times and everyone around him thought, why is he in the middle of the 2/2+1
@patrick478 I really close to this guy I think... He was sitting at the back. There was a loud guy who's language was mildly bad... 1/2
Listening to Strange Games and Things always a good idea to get through the work day. Any other suggestions? @djspinna #DJspinna #upbeat

Couldn't blame Chris Wood for going to China if an offer comes up. That's some serious money that would set him up for life...
@patrick478 @NZ_Football @iluvnix17 @HawkesBayUnited @TeamWelly what happened ?

First @WgtnPhoenixFC game of the season for me this weekend. Looking forward to 3 points!
@Nelfoos5 @LucasLeiva87 @talkSPORTLive ohhh so saving this for the end of the season.
"Tackle comes in from @LucasLeiva87 " , @talkSPORTLive. Is their anything this fine chap can't do?

@PodcastingCouch @LFC_Australia Sounds good!
@PodcastingCouch Listen to @talkSPORTLive, always decent.
Just tuned in from work in NZ. Looking forward to a good call @talkSPORTLive. You've set yourself high standards this year!
@PodcastingCouch @LFC_Australia Would be keen for sometime in Feb if you've got space!
Nice to see @LucasLeiva87 still in a red shirt!
Great show this, keep it up guys! https://t.co/GBx7mjy39K
Can we all appreciate for a second that 3 more points on Saturday could see us top 4? Well done @WgtnPhoenixFC https://t.co/UipX2kjm0p
@patrick478 @KloppGoff @Tegal1234 Munchen is lovely this time of year ;)
@AndrewGourdie @Dale_Warburton Ah in isolation yes. But you forget, all of the other confeds are gaining spots in this process too.
@rajman74 I think I heard Mou yell " Put it in the fricken mixer lads! "
@rajman74 Sorry.... we're not that direct
@rajman74 hence the :P maybe against top four club, still funny. Some nice direct play you guys had, right out of the Barons playbook :)
@ManUtd eking out a 1-1 win against top four club :P?
@rajman74 Man Utd eking out a 1-1 win against title favourites :P?
@NZPhotomac turn off then :)
@PodcastingCouch @jamesdrodriguez You heard him James, on ya come then son
Ohhhhhh, short term loan @jamesdrodriguez to @LFC till the end of the season. Wouldn't that be lovely...
@NZ_Dave @patrick478 I think a shake up in the confederations could be on the cards. Some tweaks here and there.
@NZ_Dave @patrick478 Just imagine.... Mexico having to play in New Cal... can you imagine...
Kick around at 12pm, Boyd Wilson for anyone that is keen.
@Yakcall and the training grounds..
@Yakcall When do we find out?
@chopahnz Looking forward to a cracking year in 2017 :) I'll be in touch.
@chopahnz Yeah I did, was great to be back for a bit. Went there a 2 days later, nice to see people staying away from that part of the pitch
@chopahnz yep, choice of platform also.
@patrick478 Ah just read the news. Strange thing to say.
@EarnestoMerrick @kyle_barnes15 have managed to steady the ship. Safe choice by Welnix but very wise. 2/2

@AndrewGourdie Seen UTD do it and he's like, "why don't i give that a go.."
Nicely said @DevlinLive

@talkSPORTLive - no! The sound is brilliant!
@talkSPORTLive - Already just by the pace of the call this game sounds like it's another level compared to last week. Fast start. #EVELIV
I don't know if it's where the mic is, but this crowd sounds ridiculous on @talkSPORTLive
@talkSPORTLive - Let's go Reds! Looking forward to a quality call from you lads! Crowd sounds immense #EVELIV

Wow... that's a family friendly end to Phoenix City...
@jcolemanmp Can think of worse jobs :D

Lol - @talkSPORTLive doing a great job but I'll translate what he just said about that recent sub - "All @Boro fans should be saying FFS!"

@talkSPORTLive, Fair call - keep up the good work!
Was about the weak bench :) @talkSPORTLive
Come on @SMignolet ! #midliv

Listen in from NZ to #midliv on @talkSPORTLive. Expect nothing but the best from you guys, don't disappoint! Come on ya Reds!

Well deserved @WgtnPhoenixFC ! Great counter attack with @RoyKrishna21 to continue his goalrush!
This game just got fast..... real fast #WELvCCM
